verses.verse: At <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H4757>Merodach-baladan,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1081>Baladan,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H5612>letters<s%> and a <S%H4503>present<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H2396>Hezekiah:<s%> for he had <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> he had been <S%H2470>sick,<s%> and was <S%H2388>recovered.<s%>

And <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> was <S%H8055>glad<s%> <S%H5921>of<s%> them, and <S%H7200>showed<s%> <S%H853>them<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his precious <S%H5238>things,<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and the <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and the <S%H1314>spices,<s%> and the <S%H2896>precious<s%> <S%H8081>ointment,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H3627>armor,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was <S%H4672>found<s%> in his <S%H214>treasures:<s%> there <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H1697><s%> in his <S%H1004>house,<s%> nor in <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4475>dominion,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H7200>showed<s%> them <S%H3808>not.<s%>

Then <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2396>Hezekiah,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H376>men?<s%> and from <S%H4480>whence<s%> <S%H370><s%> <S%H935>came<s%> they <S%H413>unto<s%> thee? And <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> They are <S%H935>come<s%> from a <S%H7350>far<s%> <S%H4480>country<s%> <S%H776><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, even from <S%H4480>Babylon.<s%> <S%H894><s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he, <S%H4100>What<s%> have they <S%H7200>seen<s%> in thine <S%H1004>house?<s%> And <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H559>answered,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is in mine <S%H1004>house<s%> have they <S%H7200>seen:<s%> there <S%H1961>is<s%> <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H1697><s%> among my <S%H214>treasures<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7200>showed<s%> them.
Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H2396>Hezekiah,<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of hosts: <S%H6635><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> that <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is in thine <S%H1004>house,<s%> and that <S%H834>which<s%> thy <S%H1>fathers<s%> have laid up in <S%H686>store<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> shall be <S%H5375>carried<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon:<s%> <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H1697><s%> shall be <S%H3498>left,<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And of thy <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> <S%H834>that<s%> shall <S%H3318>issue<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> thee, <S%H834>which<s%> thou shalt <S%H3205>beget,<s%> shall they take <S%H3947>away;<s%> and they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5631>eunuchs<s%> in the <S%H1964>palace<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3470>Isaiah,<s%> <S%H2896>Good<s%> is the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast <S%H1696>spoken.<s%> He <S%H559>said<s%> moreover, <S%H3588>For<s%> there shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> in my <S%H3117>days.<s%>
